languages.text: {n}Прежде чем поклониться, Махарий всматривается в вас желчным, явно оценивающим взглядом.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Прежде чем поклониться, Махарий всматривается в вас желчным, явно оценивающим взглядом.{/n} "Ваша Светлость".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}一礼の前に、ザウアーバックはあなたを厳しく品定めするような視線で精査する。{/n}「陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}一礼の前に、ザウアーバックはあなたを厳しく品定めするような視線で精査する。{/n}「陛下」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}在行礼之前，苏尔贝克以不甚友好的目光审视了你半晌，才施施然开口道。{/n}“您好，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}在行礼之前，马卡里乌斯以一种不甚友好的目光审视了你半晌，才施施然开口道。{/n}“您好，大人。”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Avant de s'incliner, Sauerback vous dévisage d'un œil critique et amer.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant de s'incliner, Macharius vous dévisage d'un œil critique et amer.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: {n}Sauerback te lanza una mirada sentenciosa antes de hacer una reverencia.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius te lanza una mirada sentenciosa antes de hacer una reverencia.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}Bevor Sauerback sich verbeugt, mustert er dich mit einem verbitterten, wertenden Blick.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}Sauerback, eğilmeden önce dargın ve iğneleyici bakışlarıyla seni süzüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Before bowing, Sauerback scrutinises you with a bitter, judgemental look.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sauerback, eğilmeden önce dargın ve iğneleyen bir bakışla seni süzüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
